sections.heading: violating law declared common nuisances
sections.text: All places where alcoholic liquor is sold or consumed in violation of any provision of section 53-186.01 shall be taken and held and are declared to be common nuisances and may be abated as such in the manner provided in the Nebraska Liquor Control Act.SourceL

53-190.Premises violating law declared common nuisances.

All places where alcoholic liquor is sold or consumed in violation of any provision of section 53-186.01 shall be taken and held and are declared to be common nuisances and may be abated as such in the manner provided in the Nebraska Liquor Control Act.

SourceLaws 1935, c. 116, § 61, p. 409;C.S.Supp.,1941, § 53-361;R.S.1943, § 53-190;Laws 1965, c. 318, § 11, p. 901;Laws 2014, LB863, § 26.
